Name: probe
Description: Type of radiation used as probe

Name: photon_energy
Description: The center photon energy of the source, before it is monochromatized or converted

Name: center_wavelength
Description: The center wavelength of the source, before it is monochromatized or converted

Name: pulse_energy
Description: For pulsed sources, the energy of a single pulse

Name: peak_power
Description: For pulsed sources, the pulse energy divided by the pulse duration

Name: number_of_bunches
Description: Number of bunches in the storage ring

Name: mode
Description: Source operating mode (single or multi bunch)

Name: top_up
Description: Is the storage ring in top up?

Name: rms_jitter
Description: For pump-probe experiments, the synchronization error between pump and probe.

Name: bunch_number_start
Description: Some facilities tag each bunch. First bunch of the  measurement
